Container.Overview: OpenClaw — Your personal AI assistant running on Unraid. Connects Claude, GPT, Gemini, DeepSeek, Kimi, xAI/Grok, Ollama and 100+ more models with WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Signal, iMessage, Teams and more. SETUP OPTIONS: • Template Variables: Fill in API keys directly in the template • .env File (Recommended): install.sh creates /mnt/user/appdata/openclaw/config/.env — edit it and set 'Env File' path in template IMAGE TAG: This template uses :main for instant updates. The :latest tag on ghcr.io often lags behind releases by days! CLI ACCESS: docker exec -it OpenClaw openclaw [command] docker exec -it OpenClaw openclaw doctor docker exec -it OpenClaw openclaw models list docker exec -it OpenClaw openclaw onboard FIRST RUN: After container starts, run: docker exec -it OpenClaw openclaw onboard FEATURES: Multi-Agent Routing, Shell Commands, File Management, Browser Control, Cron Jobs, Skills, Voice Mode, Canvas, Web Search. FREE WEB SEARCH: Run SearXNG on Unraid as a second container — unlimited, free, self-hosted. Control UI: http://YOUR-IP:18789/?token=YOUR_TOKEN Docs: https://docs.openclaw.ai Template: https://github.com/darksoon/unraid-openclaw
Container.PostArgs: sh -c "mkdir -p /root/.openclaw /home/linuxbrew; [ -f /root/.openclaw/openclaw.json ] || echo '{\"gateway\":{\"mode\":\"local\",\"bind\":\"lan\",\"controlUi\":{\"allowInsecureAuth\":true},\"auth\":{\"mode\":\"token\"}}}' > /root/.openclaw/openclaw.json; if [ -d /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew ] && [ -x /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew ]; then echo '[OpenClaw] Homebrew found.'; elif [ \"${OPENCLAW_SKIP_HOMEBREW:-0}\" = '1' ]; then echo '[OpenClaw] Homebrew skipped (OPENCLAW_SKIP_HOMEBREW=1).'; else echo '[OpenClaw] Installing Homebrew (~60s on first run)...' && NONINTERACTIVE=1 curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh | bash 2>&1 || echo '[OpenClaw] WARNING: Homebrew install failed, continuing without it.'; fi; echo '[OpenClaw] Starting Gateway...'; exec node dist/index.js gateway --bind lan"
Container.Description: OpenClaw — Personal AI assistant connecting LLMs to messaging platforms. Multi-Agent, Shell, Browser, Skills, Cron, Voice. Uses :main tag for instant updates (the :latest tag lags behind!). CLI: docker exec -it OpenClaw openclaw [cmd]

Label.Name: com.centurylinklabs.watchtower.enable
Label.Description: Enable Watchtower auto-updates for this container

Config.Name: Control UI Port
Config.Description: Web UI and Gateway API port. Access: http://IP:18789/?token=YOUR_TOKEN

Config.Name: Config
Config.Description: Configuration, sessions, credentials, WhatsApp auth, openclaw.json — everything persistent. Put .env file here for secrets file mode.

Config.Name: Env File (optional)
Config.Description: ALTERNATIVE: Load secrets from .env file. install.sh creates /mnt/user/appdata/openclaw/config/.env automatically. Edit with: nano /mnt/user/appdata/openclaw/config/.env — Leave empty to use template variables only.

Config.Name: Workspace
Config.Description: Agent workspace — files, memory, AGENTS.md, skills, projects

Config.Name: Projects
Config.Description: Additional path for coding projects

Config.Name: Homebrew
Config.Description: Persistent Homebrew storage for skills (go, npm, python etc). First start installs Homebrew (~60 sec).

Config.Name: Docker Socket
Config.Description: Docker socket for Sandbox mode — runs agent sessions in isolated containers. Enable in openclaw.json: agents.defaults.sandbox.mode = non-main

Config.Name: Gateway Token
Config.Description: Secret token for API/UI access. Generate: openssl rand -hex 24

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Claude models (recommended). console.anthropic.com — pay-as-you-go from $5

Config.Name: Claude OAuth Token
Config.Description: Use Claude Pro/Max subscription instead of API credits. Generate on PC: claude setup-token (starts with sk-ant-oat01-...). Token expires — regenerate on auth errors!

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: GPT-5/o3/Codex models. platform.openai.com

Config.Name: OpenRouter API Key
Config.Description: 200+ models via one API including free ones! openrouter.ai — Tip: use openrouter/auto for automatic model selection

Config.Name: Gemini API Key
Config.Description: Google Gemini models. aistudio.google.com — generous free tier!

Config.Name: xAI (Grok) API Key
Config.Description: Grok models by xAI. console.x.ai

Config.Name: Groq API Key
Config.Description: Fast Llama/Mixtral inference. console.groq.com — generous free tier!

Config.Name: Cerebras API Key
Config.Description: Cerebras inference (30 req/min free!). cloud.cerebras.ai

Config.Name: Mistral API Key
Config.Description: Mistral models. console.mistral.ai

Config.Name: Kimi Coding API Key
Config.Description: Kimi Coding (Anthropic-compatible). Moonshot AI

Config.Name: Moonshot API Key
Config.Description: Moonshot/Kimi K2.5 (OpenAI-compatible). platform.moonshot.cn — 500K tokens/day free! Needs models.providers config.

Config.Name: DeepSeek API Key
Config.Description: DeepSeek V3/Reasoner. platform.deepseek.com — extremely cheap! Needs models.providers config in openclaw.json

Config.Name: HuggingFace Token
Config.Description: HuggingFace Inference API. huggingface.co/settings/tokens — model: huggingface/deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-R1

Config.Name: GitHub Copilot Token
Config.Description: GitHub Copilot OAuth. Run on another machine first: openclaw models auth login-github-copilot

Config.Name: Ollama Base URL
Config.Description: Ollama for local models (free!). e.g. http://192.168.1.100:11434 — then set model to ollama/llama3.1

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token
Config.Description: Discord bot token. Also configurable via Control UI.

Config.Name: Telegram Bot Token
Config.Description: Telegram bot token from @BotFather.

Config.Name: Slack Bot Token
Config.Description: Slack Bot Token (xoxb-...).

Config.Name: Slack App Token
Config.Description: Slack App-Level Token (xapp-...) for Socket Mode.

Config.Name: Brave Search API Key
Config.Description: Brave Search (default provider). WARNING: Free tier discontinued! See SearXNG/Tavily/Serper for free alternatives.

Config.Name: Tavily API Key
Config.Description: Tavily — AI-optimized search with free tier! app.tavily.com. Best Brave replacement. Use web-search-plus skill or Tavily MCP plugin.

Config.Name: Serper API Key
Config.Description: Serper.dev — Google Search Results API. 2,500 queries/month FREE! serper.dev

Config.Name: SearXNG URL
Config.Description: SearXNG metasearch — COMPLETELY FREE and UNLIMITED! Self-host on Unraid: docker run -d --name searxng -p 8888:8080 searxng/searxng:latest — then enter http://YOUR-IP:8888 here. Use local-websearch or web-search-plus skill.

Config.Name: ElevenLabs API Key
Config.Description: ElevenLabs text-to-speech for Voice/Talk Mode. elevenlabs.io

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Container timezone for cron jobs and logs. Europe/Berlin, America/New_York, Asia/Tokyo etc.

Config.Name: Gateway Port (internal)
Config.Description: Internal gateway port (must match external port).

Config.Name: Skip Homebrew
Config.Description: Set to 1 to skip Homebrew installation (faster start, but skills requiring brew/go/npm won't work).

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: debug, info, warn, error. Empty = default (info). Set to debug for troubleshooting.

Config.Name: PATH
Config.Description: System PATH including Homebrew. DO NOT CHANGE!
